title: ScreenKit Project Configuration
description: Schema for ScreenKit project configuration file (screenkit.yml)

episode_dir.description: Directory where episode source files are stored. Supports placeholders like %{episode_number}, %{episode_slug} and %{date}.

output_dir.description: Directory where generated video files will be saved. Supports placeholders like %{episode_number}, %{episode_slug} and %{date}.
